index_terms: DEPARTMENT OF HOUSING AND URBAN DEVELOPMENT
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to assistance for the homeless; authorizing an agreement with the United States Department of Housing and Urban Development for additional funds available under the McKinney-Vento Homeless Assistance Act and increasing appropriations in the 2008 budget of the Human Services Department; all by a three- fourths vote of the City Council.
committee: Public Safety, Human Services, and Education
